Contract clause (to include in agreement)

- Contractor will correct rejected items at no additional cost within the time specified in the schedule.

- Contractor represents that all citations are to Reliable Sources and that, to the best of Contractor’s knowledge, canonical answers reflect prevailing scholarly consensus where one exists, and that disputed items were flagged and documented according to this clause.

QA checklist (operational guidance for content team and reviewers)

- [ ] At least one citation to a Reliable Source included (URL or bibliographic reference).
